titles.title: Surely Goodness And Mercy Shall Follow Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life. (2x)
And I shall dwell in the house of the Lord forever
And I shall feast at the table prepared for me
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.
